pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non Linear Time Series Analysis // The main functionalities of this package are about time series forecasting and causality detection. In particular, it provides a neural network Vector Auto-Regressive, the classical Granger causality test C.W.J.Granger (1980) doi:10.1016/0165-1889(80)90069-X, and a non-linear version of it.
